snippet: Sam, the first openly gay player to sign in the Canadian Football League, left training camp for personal reasons.
abstract: Montreal Alouettes defensive end Michael Sam, first openly gay player in Canadian Football League, returns home to Texas from training camp for personal reasons; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Sam, the first openly gay player to sign in the Canadian Football League, left training camp for personal reasons.

headline.main: Michael Sam Leaves Montreal Alouettes’ Camp
